mapper.select: SELECT sh.shipid, sh.shipdate, sh.shipcode, sh.workcode, sh.stockid, st.itemid, it.itemname, it.clientcode, sh.shipcount, sh.shipsts, sh.membercode FROM ship sh LEFT JOIN stock st ON sh.stockid = st.stockid LEFT JOIN item it ON st.itemid = it.itemid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ship (shipsts, workcode, clientname, itemname, shipcount, shipdate, membercode) VALUES ( #{shipsts}, #{workcode}, #{cleintcode}, #{itemname}, #{shipcount}, #{shipdate}, #{membercode} )
